Test Name: Drug Abuse Survey with Confirmation, Panel 9, Chain of Custody, Random, Urine
Purpose: To detect and confirm the presence of nine classes of drugs in random urine specimens while maintaining chain of custody, ensuring accurate, reliable, and legally defensible results.
Container: Wide-mouth, screw-capped plastic container without preservatives
Equipment: Urine collection kits with chain-of-custody forms, immunoassay analyzer, centrifuge, GC-MS or LC-MS/MS instrumentation
